Package problem2

Class Civilian

java.lang.Object
problem2.AbstractPiece
problem2.Civilian
All Implemented Interfaces:
Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Engineer, Farmer
public class Civilian extends AbstractPiece
Civilian is a piece contains name, age and wealth. Civilian is the subclass of AbstractPiece.

  • Constructor Details

    • Civilian

      public Civilian(Name name, Integer age, Double wealth) throws IncorrectAgeException, IncorrectWealthAmountException
      Constructor that creates a new Civilian object with the name, age and wealth
      Parameters:
      name - - name of the new civilian object, Name class
      age - - age of the new civilian object, Integer
      wealth - - wealth of the new civilian object, Double
      Throws:
      IncorrectAgeException - if the age is not valid.
      IncorrectWealthAmountException - if the wealth is not valid.

      public void increase(Double number) throws IncorrectWealthAmountException

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      IncorrectWealthAmountException - if the amount is smaller than 0.

      Parameters:
      number - The decreasing amount of wealth, double
      Throws:
      IncorrectWealthAmountException - if the amount is smaller than 0 or too large to minus.
